# Expression Trees Docs

## Expression Trees

- [Expression Trees](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/expression-trees/index.md): Learn more about: Expression Trees (Visual Basic)
- [How to: Execute Expression Trees](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/expression-trees/how-to-execute-expression-trees.md): Learn more about: How to: Execute Expression Trees (Visual Basic)
- [How to: Modify Expression Trees](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/expression-trees/how-to-modify-expression-trees.md): Learn more about: How to: Modify Expression Trees (Visual Basic)
- [How to: Use Expression Trees to Build Dynamic Queries](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/expression-trees/how-to-use-expression-trees-to-build-dynamic-queries.md): Describes various techniques your code can use to query dynamically depending on runtime state, by varying either LINQ method calls or the expression trees passed into those methods.
- [Debugging Expression Trees](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/expression-trees/debugging-expression-trees-in-visual-studio.md): Learn more about: Debugging Expression Trees in Visual Studio (Visual Basic)
- [DebugView Syntax](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/expression-trees/debugview-syntax.md): Learn about the special syntax used by the DebugView property to produce a string representation of expression trees in Visual Basic.
